alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:36PM MST until January 07 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, highest on the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 9 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with areas of blowing snow and low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
